message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell me the product. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I think my product is worth a bit more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to counter with an offer of $125 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $125, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll offer it to you for $132.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $130, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $131.25.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $131.25. I'll meet you halfway and offer it to you for $131.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to finalize the purchase of the product at $130.
